message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $8800.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go a bit lower to $8600?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $8700, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8600? I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price
